messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Don't Bother Me Mom – I'm Learn ing
messages.msgSnippet: I *hast* and am.  I find it courageous (considering how few books like this are out) and uplifting (considering the books out are more about *fear* than a fair
messages.messageBody:
I *hast* and am. I find it courageous (considering how few books like
this are out) and uplifting (considering the books out are more about
*fear* than a fair and balanced look). Kelly is getting me another
book called "Playstation Nation" for me to read to see it from the
other point of few.

I plan to write about gaming in Danielle Conger's e-zine "Connections"
in a future edition.

Ben Lovejoy


-----Original Message-----
From: dialog@...
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sat, 27 Jan 2007 8:47 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Don't Bother Me Mom – I'm Learning

Dear List,

hast anyone read this?

"Don't Bother Me Mom--I'm Learning" How Computer and Video Games Are
Preparing Your Kids For 21st Century Success--and How You Can Help!
by Marc Prensky

Can you recommend it?

Greetings
Johanna

--
Unerzogen! | dialog@... | http://www.unerzogen.de |
unerzogen-subscribe@...

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Don't  Bother Me Mom – I'm Learning
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, I loved it! The author talks about how our kids are digital natives while us parents are digital immigrants and that we need to learn to speak their
messages.messageBody:
Yes, I loved it!

The author talks about how our kids are "digital natives" while us parents
are "digital immigrants" and that we need to learn to speak their language
<g>.

One of the online games the author suggests is toontown.com so the kids & I
are playing it a lot :)

heather
...mom to quentin, 11, and sierra, 8
...tucson

p.s. if you want to try toontown, let me know and I can send you a link for
a free 7 day trial. You can go to toontown.com yourself and get a 3 day
trial. If you use my link, I get jellybeans, the currency of toontown.



On 1/27/07, Johanna <dialog@...> wrote:

> Dear List,
